DOC.brief_summary: This study was conducted to provide detailed information on the efficacy of indacaterol in terms of its effect on spirometry assessed forced expiratory volume in 1 second (FEV1) over a 24 hour time period.
DOC.brief_title: A Crossover Study to Determine the 24 Hour Lung Function Profile of Indacaterol in Patients With Moderate-to-severe Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease (COPD)
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis of chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) (moderatetosevere as classified by the Global Initiative for Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease (GOLD) Guidelines, 2006) and: 1.
